custom_css: /* Make designer name bold */.designer-name {font-weight: bold; font-size: 24px;}

settings.designer_bio: Working as Trainee Software Engineer at ITS

settings.heading: Elevate Your Game with Premium Sports Gear!
settings.subtext: Unleash your passion for sports with Our Store, your one-stop shop for premium sports gear, equipment, and apparel. Whether you’re a seasoned athlete, a weekend warrior, or just starting your fitness journey, we’ve got you covered with everything you need to excel

custom_css: .footer-block__image-wrapper {display: block; margin: 0 auto; /* Centers the logo horizontally */ text-align: center;}
/* If the logo is inside a container, center the container */.brand-logo-container {display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center;}
